item.title: The Importance of Glutamine in Your Diet
item.description: Glutamine, often referred to as the “conditionally essential ” amino acid, plays a crucial role in various physiological functions within the human body. In this article, we will explore why consuming glutamine is important for overall health and well-being. What is Glutamine? Glutamine is the most abundant amino acid in the bloodstream and is synthesized primarily in skeletal muscle . It serves as a building block for proteins and also plays a key role in cellular energy production.
